Method Detail

setSubtitlePath

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitlePath(java.lang.String filePath)
Set subtitle file path for external subtitle (e.g. smi, srt files, etc.).

Parameters:
filePath - [in] Full path to the subtitle file.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

enableSubtitle

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableSubtitle(boolean value)
Display/hide subtitles; default is false.

Parameters:
value - [in] Display/hide; true to display subtitle, false to hide subtitle.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontColor

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontColor(int color)
Set subtitle font color

Parameters:
color - [in] Font color (such as 0x00RRGGBB) of subtitle text.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontOpacity

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontOpacity(int alpha)
Set subtitle font color opacity rate

Parameters:
alpha - [in] Font color opacity rate. The valid range is 0 to 100, from transparent to opaque.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontSizeScale

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontSizeScale(int scale)
Set subtitle font size scale

Parameters:
scale - [in] Font size scale for subtitle text. The valid range is 50 to 200, where 50 is the smallest and is half of the default size, and 200 is the largest and is twice the default size.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontBackgroundColor

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontBackgroundColor(int color)

Parameters:
color - [in] Subtitle font background color (such as 0x00RRGGBB).
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

Parameters:
alpha - [in] Subtitle font background color opacity rate. The valid range is 0 to 100, from transparent to opaque.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontItalic

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontItalic(boolean enable)
Set subtitle font italic

Parameters:
enable - [in] Enable/disable; true to enable subtitle font italic.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontUnderline

setSubtitleFontName

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontName(java.lang.String name)
Set subtitle font name

Parameters:
name - [in] Font name for subtitle text.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontEdgeType

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontEdgeType(int type)
Set subtitle font edge type

Parameters:
type - [in] Edge type of subtitle font. Valid values are 0:NONE, 1:RAISED, 2:DEPRESSED, 3:UNIFORM, 4:LEFT_DROP_SHADOW, 5:RIGHT_DROP_SHADOW.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontEdgeColor

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontEdgeColor(int color)
Set subtitle font edge color

Parameters:
color - [in] Font edge color (such as 0x00RRGGBB) of subtitle text.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setSubtitleFontEdgeOpacity

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSubtitleFontEdgeOpacity(int alpha)
Set subtitle font edge color opacity rate

Parameters:
alpha - [in] Edge color opacity rate of subtitle font. The valid range is 0 to 100, from transparent to opaque.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

resetSubtitleParameter

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE resetSubtitleParameter()
Reset all parameters to their default values. Subtitles will be presented as specified in the subtitle stream.

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.
